Click on More Games if you want to play thousands unblocked games. Click on the Web Version if you want to play the online version.
long.en_AU,en_US,fi,ru,vi:
Stickman Hook Unblocked Game is a thrilling and addictive arcade game available as a Chrome extension. In this action-packed game, you control a stickman who swings through vibrant and challenging levels using a grappling hook. Launch your stickman into the air, time your swings, and navigate through various obstacles and hazards. With its simple controls, fluid physics, and dynamic gameplay, "Stickman Hook" provides an exhilarating experience. The Chrome extension allows for easy access, enabling you to enjoy the game directly in your browser. Plus, it's unblocked and free to play on the monkeymart.org website, ensuring uninterrupted swinging fun. Swing, jump, and defy gravity as you master the art of stickman acrobatics in "Stickman Hook Unblocked Game"!

HOW TO PLAY?
Space/left mouse click – Hold to swing

Click on More Games if you want to play thousands unblocked games. Click on the Web Version if you want to play the online version.
